short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate the phrase 'racially offensive/charged' into what it really is: racist

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to replace the phrase, "racially offensive" and "racially charged" to "racist" because that's what it means.
